persona.name: David
persona.bio: David is a 27-year-old graduate student who loves movies and TV shows. He often checks IMDB to read reviews, watch trailers, and see ratings before deciding what to watch. David isn’t very technical but is comfortable browsing popular sites. Tonight, he wants to quickly look up a movie his friends recommended so he can decide whether it’s worth watching.

interactions.intent: Search for the movie 'Inception' on IMDB to check its rating and reviews.
interactions.thought: Let me nav to explore further.
